mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALBA(ALBA_SEQ, ALBA_NAME, ALBA_PHONE, ALBA_ADDRESS, ALBA_TIMESAL, ALBA_BANK, ALBA_ACCOUNT, ALBA_DELFLAG, ALBA_REGDATE, STORE_CODE) VALUES(ALBA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{alba_name}, #{alba_phone}, #{alba_address}, #{alba_timesal}, #{alba_bank}, #{alba_account}, 'N', #{alba_regdate}, #{store_code})
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, ALBA_SEQ, ALBA_NAME, ALBA_PHONE, ALBA_ADDRESS, ALBA_TIMESAL, ALBA_BANK, ALBA_ACCOUNT, ALBA_DELFLAG, ALBA_REGDATE, STORE_CODE FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ALBA_NAME ASC) RNUM, ALBA_SEQ, ALBA_NAME, ALBA_PHONE, ALBA_ADDRESS, ALBA_TIMESAL, ALBA_BANK, ALBA_ACCOUNT, ALBA_DELFLAG, ALBA_REGDATE, STORE_CODE FROM ALBA WHERE STORE_CODE = #{store_code} AND ALBA_DELFLAG=#{alba_delflag}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALBA WHERE STORE_CODE = #{store_code} AND ALBA_DELFLAG=#{alba_delflag}
mapper.update: UPDATE ALBA SET ALBA_DELFLAG='Y' WHERE ALBA_SEQ = #{alba_seq}
